str2: From apo and krino; to conclude for oneself, i.e. to respond; by Hebraism to begin to speak.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

str2: To dip into. From en and bapto; to whelm on, i.e. Wet By contact with a fluid.

In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A deep dish, platter, bowl. Neuter of a presumed derivative of uncertain affinity; a bowl.
